rows: Specify the date and time when Creatio will start sending the email.
Specify the time zone to use for scheduling. The time zone of the email creator is selected out of the box.
html:
Field

Value

Date and time

Specify the date and time when Creatio will start sending the email.

Time zone

Specify the time zone to use for scheduling. The time zone of the email creator is selected out of the box.
